list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a sound, especially one that is loud or unpleasant or that causes disturbance.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: making a noise like a pig in a trough
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tạo tiếng ồn như một con lợn trong máng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: irregular fluctuations that accompany a transmitted electrical signal but are not part of it and tend to obscure it.
